name: devops-file-creator
description: This task allows you to create a file.
author: davidpolaniaac

inputs.name: fileoverwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite file if exists
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if you want to overwrite the file if it already exists.

inputs.name: skipempty
inputs.label: Skip file creation when content is empty
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify if you want to skip file creation when the provided content is empty.

inputs.name: filepath
inputs.label: File path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path and name of the file you want to create.

inputs.name: filecontent
inputs.label: File content
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the content of the file.

inputs.name: endWithNewLine
inputs.label: End file with new line
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies if you want to automatically add a new line at the end of the file that will be created.
